content.text: You should look at this chart about genre
In 2016, Spotify began publishing a ranking of genres, based on  total streams.
It’s a fairly benign list that probably doesn’t look that much different to the music that we listen to now.
Until you see what it looks like today, in 2023.
Everything in red is new to the top 25.

content.highlight: urbano latino, trap latino, reggaeton, filmi
